results.overview: Told in four episodes, an unnamed artist is transported through a mirror into another dimension, where he travels through various bizarre scenarios. This film is the first part of Cocteau's Orphic Trilogy, which consists of The Blood of a Poet (1932), Orpheus (1950) and Testament of Orpheus (1960).
results.title: The Blood of a Poet

results.overview: The odd-couple courtship saga continues of wealthy, middle-aged retiree Qin Fen and serious-minded young air hostess Xiaoxiao. After an amusing prelude in which Qin presides over a lavish divorce ceremony for an amicably splitting married couple, he and Xiaoxiao decide to address their own relationship barriers — her youth and beauty, his cynical, childish sense of humor — by entering into a trial marriage while on a trip to the country's tropical southeast.
results.title: If You Are the One 2

results.original_title: Rapunzel, El Perro y El Brujo
results.overview: El Perro, a kidnapped soldier, takes advantage of a confrontation between his captors and the paramilitaries to escape. In his escape, he takes refuge in the house of a peasant family that keeps a dark secret that he must solve to be free.
results.title: Rapunzel, The Dog and The Warlock

results.overview: On the eve of the admissions cycle for New York City kindergartens, Alex and Greg Wheeler have high hopes for four-year-old Jake. The director of Jake's preschool encourages them to accentuate Jake's gender expansive behavior to help him stand out. As Alex and Greg navigate their roles as parents, a rift grows between them, one that forces them to confront their own concerns about what's best for Jake, and each other.
results.title: A Kid Like Jake

results.overview: Ottone, a professional dog sitter who's uncertain about most things in life, asks an analyst if he made the right decision love-wise while recounting the significant relationships he had with four women.
results.title: Fuochi d'artificio

results.overview: Oobah Butler, a writer and filmmaker with a history of pulling elaborate pranks and gaming the system to advance his career, has his sights set on challenging Amazon.
results.title: The Great Amazon Heist

results.overview: Jana’s magical journey to Africa contains a deep message about friendship, love, passion, nature and imagination. It is a spiritual journey for adults and a magical one for kids, full of mysteries, adventures and discoveries
results.title: Magic Journey to Africa

results.overview: Steve Mackleson is a dangerous prisoner, incarcerated for double murder in a maximum security prison. We follow, as he navigates his struggle against redemption the system and his inner turmoil, when a young black gang member becomes his unlikely new cell mate and a daughter he has never met, finally requests to meet her estranged father, face to face.
results.title: A Violent Man

results.overview: A teen attempts to befriend her crush who lives across the street. However, the only time they see each other is the brief walk from the front door to their cars on their way to school.
results.title: Across the Street

results.original_title: Comedy Central Roast of Alec Baldwin
results.overview: Sean Hayes serves as roast master as it is Alec Baldwin's turn in the hot seat. Robert De Niro, Jeff Ross, and Caitlyn Jenner among others take jabs at the actor/comedian.
results.title: Comedy Central Roast of Alec Baldwin

results.original_title: The Teahouse of the August Moon
results.overview: An Okinawan translator introduces U.S. occupation forces to the joys of local life.
results.title: The Teahouse of the August Moon

results.original_title: CR NO: 89 (u/s 323,324,379 IPC, section 4,r/w 25(1)(b)of arms act 1959)
results.overview: The film focuses on the moral dilemmas one faces in life.
results.title: CR NO: 89 (u/s 323,324,379 IPC, section 4,r/w 25(1)(b)of arms act 1959)

results.overview: Anatole is always dragging his little pan behind him. It fell on him one day, for no reason. Ever since, it gets caught everywhere and prevents him from going forward. Anatole is fed up, so he hides. Luckily, things are not that simple.
results.title: Anatole's Little Saucepan

results.overview: Starring 32 artists from SM Town. The movie reflect the past, present and future of each artist with behind-the-scenes footage that follows the stars as they undergo rehearsals, revealing their day-to-day lives and also features interview, video diaries and never-seen-before archive files.
results.title: I AM. SMtown Live World Tour In Madison Square Garden

results.original_title: Érase una vez en el Caribe
results.overview: Juan Encarnación is a reserved jibaro with a violent past. When Pura, the woman he loves, disappears, Encarnación sets out on a path of revenge armed with his machete and his daughter, Patria, in his arms.
results.title: Once Upon a Time in the Caribbean

results.original_title: Birds Flying Flying Flying Birds Fly Away
results.overview: Two destructive transgender people meet in Liverpool, causing an apocalypse.
results.title: Birds Flying Flying Flying Birds Fly Away

results.overview: Following a night of unfortunate circumstances, Jeff gets a scary nightmare.
results.title: Alpha Quail

results.overview: Under threat of eviction, an old man hides himself inside his flat, ready for anything - except the cruel twist of fate that will force him to reassess his whole life.
results.title: The Angel in the Wall

results.overview: In winter 1990, a friendly bowling match turned into a deadly nightmare when a pair of robbers walked into the Las Cruces, New Mexico, lanes, emptied the safe and then shot the bowlers. This documentary takes a close look at the still-unsolved case.
results.title: A Nightmare in Las Cruces
